pull.title: Allow move RPC to take account balances negative
pull.body:
Use case:  Customer owes you bitcoins, so you create a payment address
associated with an account with a negative balance (the amount they owe), using
move ...account... ...other_account... +amount
When customer pays, that account balance will go to zero.

This doesn't change sends-- you still can't send from an account with a zero or negative balance.

repo.name: bitcoin-git
repo.description: Feature branches that aren't yet, or never will be, ready for mainline bitcoin

events.message:

Use case:  Customer owes you bitcoins, so you create a payment address
associated with an account with a negative balance (the amount they owe).
When customer pays, that account balance will go to zero.

events.body: ACK. The "" account can already go negative because of simple sends anyway.
